desc: Called when text has been entered by the user. For example if shift-2 is pressed on an American keyboard layout, the text "@" will be generated.
notes: Besure to call Controls("keyboard") in the first line of the game !
The keyboard on android can be closed by the user, so to reshow it you should call `textinput(true)` in _touchpressed() callback.

args.name: text
args.desc: The inputted text, with modifier key actions applied.
